actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution requesting the President to issue a proclamation designating the the week of April 23, 1973, as "Nicolaus Copernicus Week" marking the quinquecentennial of his birth.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to issue a proclamation designating the week of April 23, 1973, as "Nicolaus Copernicus Week" marking the quinquecentennial of his birth.

titles.title: Joint resolution requesting the President to issue a proclamation designating the the week of April 23, 1973, as "Nicolaus Copernicus Week" marking the quinquecentennial of his birth.
